ygData.subject: RE: Equipment ?
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the best investments I could suggest would be the purchase of some new rings.  Around 20th level I purchased a pair of gold carnelian rings (+5 agility)
ygData.messageBody:
One of the best investments I could suggest would be the purchase of some
new rings. Around 20th level I purchased a pair of gold carnelian rings (+5
agility) for 65pp and firmly believe that they have saved my life on many
occasions. This is especially true when being run over by a train in Unrest
where that one extra miss/dodge/parry can mean the difference between life
and a gruesome death.

I would also look into the possibility of upgrading your two-handed weapon.
Although the 1H vs. 2H debate rages to this very day, I personally believe
that 2H is the way to go after 20th until/if you get Ghoulbane. A shiny
brass halberd and bone bladed claymore are both well within your price range
(~100pp on Povar). I personally preferred the halberd because that -8
agility hit with the claymore is brutal, but I know many of our brethren
that have been happy with both. In the mid-20's it's then time to start
looking for a blackened iron bastard sword. I have one and it's my pride
and joy...

Peace favor your sword,

Jarad Argentedge
27th level Paladin of Tunare
Blue Rose Order
Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Blizzard [SMTP:blizzard15@...]
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 1:27 PM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com; eq_holyswords@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Equipment ?

Hello all, i have a question regarding equipment for a paldin. Here
is what i wear:

�
Bronze Chest
1 Bronze and 1 Banded Wristband
Bronze Pants

Banded Cloak
Banded Mantle

Bronze Helm
Bronze Sleeves
Leering Mask
Banded Gorget
Thick Leather Apron
�
And now the part that needs fixing:
�
1 Onyx Ring
2 Derv Rings
�
What type of stat do I need the most upgrading? Second? Why?
I use a Combine Scimmy and a Chitin Shell Shield for 1hs and a FS
2her for 2hs.
So, now that you've seen it all what needs to be upgraded most? I'm
lookin for stuff that i can get for the 250pp or so i have or things a level
20 could get. Thanks for your time.
�
-Aldarn, E'Ci
